ygData.subject: RE: i haven't been stunned lately.....
ygData.msgSnippet: I will tell you this if you look up invulnerable in the dictionary it means that your can no long take damamge. Verant sees stunning as a non damage tactic so
ygData.messageBody:
I will tell you this if you look up invulnerable in the dictionary it means
that your can no long take damamge. Verant sees stunning as a non damage
tactic so therefore don't waste your time holding your breath cause its
never gonna be fixed. I've been petitioning about it since beta 4 and no
such luck its not happening. Sorry to burst your bubble.

Kris

> Well, I know I just got stunned 3 times in the same period of invuln today
> running from a train in unrest that was all blue, no greens. So I don't
> think that has much to do with it. And I'd say at this point if it's not
> been fixed by Verant, I'm personally not holding my breath to see
> it happen.
>
> Lohre Soulsaver
> Bristlebane
>
>
